name: Swamp Stompers
description:
User WASD to move around for player 1 and Up, Down, Left and Right for Player 2.

Play with a friend or VS the CPU! Stomp on your opponent to win. You don't control your jump, but instead are forced to jump by the trampoline.

Game Design and Development: Andres Reyes

Logo and Background Artist, Animator: Brenna Verner

Asset Artist, UI Design: Yeny "Yen" Martinez
